      SearchForAccounts SearchForAccounts.currencyGreaterThan​(Long currencyGreaterThan)
      Results should have an amount greater than this value.
      SearchForAccounts SearchForAccounts.currencyLessThan​(Long currencyLessThan)

      SearchForAccounts SearchForAccounts.exclude​(List<Enums.Exclude> exclude)
      Exclude additional items such as asset holdings, application local data stored for this account, asset parameters created by this account, and application parameters created by this account.
      SearchForAccounts SearchForAccounts.includeAll​(Boolean includeAll)
      Include all items including closed accounts, deleted applications, destroyed assets, opted-out asset holdings, and closed-out application localstates.
      SearchForAccounts SearchForAccounts.limit​(Long limit)
      Maximum number of results to return.
      SearchForAccounts SearchForAccounts.next​(String next)
      The next page of results.
